verses.verse: The <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, even all the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, shall have no <S%H2506>portion<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, and his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
And they shall have no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, as he hath spoken unto <S%H1696>them<s%>.

And this shall be the <S%H3548>priests<s%>' <S%H4941>due<s%> from the <S%H5971>people<s%>, from them that <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>, whether it be <S%H7794>ox<s%> or <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, that they shall <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H2220>shoulder<s%>, and the two <S%H3895>cheeks<s%>, and the <S%H6896>maw<s%>.

The <S%H7225>first-fruits<s%> of thy <S%H1715>grain<s%>, of thy new <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and of thine <S%H3323>oil<s%>, and the <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1488>fleece<s%> of thy <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, shalt thou give <S%H5414>him<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> him out of all thy <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, to <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, him and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> for <S%H3117>ever<s%>.

And if a <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H259>any<s%> of thy <S%H8179>gates<s%> out of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, where he <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> with all the <S%H185>desire<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul<s%> unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>;

then he shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%>, as all his <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5975>do<s%>, who stand there <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
They shall have like <S%H2506>portions<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>, besides that which cometh of the <S%H4465>sale<s%> of his <S%H1>patrimony<s%>.

When thou art <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H3925>thee<s%>, thou shalt not learn to <S%H6213>do<s%> after the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of those <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

There shall not be <S%H4672>found<s%> with thee any one that maketh his <S%H1121>son<s%> or his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H784>fire<s%>, one that <S%H7080>useth<s%> <S%H7081>divination<s%>, one that practiseth <S%H6049>augury<s%>, or an <S%H5172>enchanter<s%>, or a <S%H3784>sorcerer<s%>,
or a <S%H2266>charmer<s%>, or a <S%H7592>consulter<s%> with a familiar <S%H178>spirit<s%>, or a <S%H3049>wizard<s%>, or a <S%H1875>necromancer<s%>.

For whosoever <S%H6213>doeth<s%> these things is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and <S%H1558>because<s%> of these <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> doth drive them <S%H3423>out<s%> from before <S%H6440>thee<s%>.
Thou shalt be <S%H8549>perfect<s%> with <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

For these <S%H1471>nations<s%>, that thou shalt <S%H3423>dispossess<s%>, <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto them that practise <S%H6049>augury<s%>, and unto <S%H7080>diviners<s%>; but as for <S%H3068>thee<s%>, Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath not suffered thee so to <S%H5414>do<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> unto thee a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> from the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H251>thee<s%>, of thy brethren, like unto <S%H8085>me<s%>; unto him ye shall hearken;

according to all that thou <S%H7592>desiredst<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let me not <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, neither let me <S%H7200>see<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> any <S%H4191>more<s%>, that I die not.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3190>me<s%>, They have well said that which they have <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

I will raise them <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, like unto <S%H5414>thee<s%>; and I will put my <S%H1697>words<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto them all that I shall command <S%H6680>him<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H376>pass<s%>, that whosoever will not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto my <S%H1697>words<s%> which he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> in my <S%H8034>name<s%>, I will require it of <S%H1875>him<s%>.

But the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, that shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H2102>presumptuously<s%> in my <S%H8034>name<s%>, which I have not <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him to <S%H1696>speak<s%>, or that shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, that same <S%H5030>prophet<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%>.
And if thou <S%H559>say<s%> in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, How shall we <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath not <S%H1696>spoken<s%>?

when a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, if the <S%H1697>thing<s%> follow <S%H935>not<s%>, nor come to pass, that is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath not <S%H1696>spoken<s%>: the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it <S%H2087>presumptuously<s%>, thou shalt not be afraid of <S%H1481>him<s%>.
